additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Alarm System, corner, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 The apartment is located on Saburtalo(upper baxtrioni) in a newly built home. Place in in the center but quite the same time. The apartment is fully furnished and provided with furniture.
- Autonomous heating system and hot water ( gas )
- Furniture for every room
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Storeroom ( chulani )
- Internet access (cable and wireless )
- Cable TV
- Shower - shower
- Land line
- Own alarm system
- 2 Balconys
The apartment is located in the corner and benefits best views of Tbilisi from Saburtalo.
